summaryContent: Analytical educator-engineer with 4 years of secondary-level mathematics teaching and 2+ years of full-stack AI tooling experience. Conceived and shipped an AI-driven mathematics-content generator that automates learning materials creation and speeds up teacher prep time. Adept at turning complex classroom problems into scalable, user-centric software solutions.
